column4: Hello All! Im a newb at linux. Has anyone used webmin to adminster ubuntu server?
Logan: is there something similar to webmin that a newb can use to get an ubuntu server up and running quickly?
Logan: Thanks.  I'm a strong auditory/visual learner. does anyone know of any podcasts I can use to learn ubuntu linux please?
You can always search youtube, someone might have posted what you search for..
